subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Anna Fenninger of Austria skied a nearly flawless second run to capture a giant slalom in Lienz, Austria, for her first World Cup win, while Lindsey Vonn finished fifth.
snippet: Anna Fenninger of Austria skied a nearly flawless second run to capture a giant slalom in Lienz, Austria, for her first World Cup win, while Lindsey Vonn finished fifth.
